    level="1"
    right="Item 25"
    pfs=""
>
[Radiant Spark](/Equipment.aspx?ID=900)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Agents of Edgewatch</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege](/Sources.aspx?ID=54) pg. 74</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This shining prism is bound within a golden frame. The bright glow within the artifact is the gleaming essence of [celestials](/Traits.aspx?ID=23) bound within it in ancient times. Each activation consumes a bit of this celestial energy, projecting the screams of the celestials into your mind. While holding the _Radiant Spark_, you gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) spells and effects and you are aware of its powers. If you are good, while holding the _Radiant Spark_, you are [sickened 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) and can't recover from this condition.

<document level="2" id="action-678" />

<document level="2" id="action-679" />

<document level="2" id="action-680" />

**Destruction** An archfiend or evil demigod must willingly swap their essence with that of a celestial dominated or bound by the artifact, then critically fail the saving throw against having their essence consumed. This permanently destroys both the artifact and the fiend or demigod.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
